attributes.action: make it compulsory for all new houses to have solar technology installed to generate electricty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If every new house currently being built today, had solar technology to generate electric energy! It would start a trend which would eventually mean every building in the country, could generate electric going some way to reducing carbon emissions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
